description:
The continued story of Brooks the pirate and his friend Laboon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brook no Kako: Youki na Nakama Kanashiki Wakare
Brook`s Past! A Sad Farewell with His Cheerful Comrade!
Le passé de Brook. Tristes adieux à de joyeux compagnons
Прошлое Брука – грустное прощание с весёлой командой
ブルックの過去 陽気な仲間悲しき別れ
